ingredients.ingredient: ¾ cup barbeque sauce (such as Cattlemen's® or Jack Daniel's®)

cookingTips: Cook bacon until crispy before wrapping around chicken
Bake chicken at 375°F until internal temperature reaches 165°F
Top with barbecue sauce and bacon during last 5 minutes of baking
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This combines bacon and barbecue for flavor. Would you like guidance on timing the bacon cooking or ensuring the chicken stays moist?
